text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Shoooock―!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Lost… lost… lost… lost……!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Could it be that I… Have lost!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: How can that be when… I'm the spectacular class president!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Iiiiiiiiiiiiii!? Iiiiii, iiiii, iiiimpossible!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But, but, but, I truly did lose…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ha… Could it be, I…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――have no talent!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I truly can't run long distances like everyone says! Nonono, I'm the class president, I can't――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wait, could it be, I am… the class president……no longer!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Because if I can't be the envy of everyone, then I'm… no longer the class president……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I, if that's true!! If I'm not the class president, I'm not me anymore!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Then, who am I!? Nice to meet you, hello!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You're Sakura Bakushin O, the girl who's going to be class president!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Down…!? You want me to fall down!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Breathe in…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Breathe out…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ah, the air feels good… It's underground, though.
She's finally calmed down, but the damage from the loss is still too great. If that's the case…
choice_data_list:
Right now, you're still in the 
process of growing up.

Right now, you're still in the 
process of growing up.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The process of growing up…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's true, too! I still had a lot of room to grow!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes, it's not that I'm not good enough. It's just that I haven't grown enough!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Carelessly, I had completely forgot that I'm such a spectacular Uma Musume. Thoughtlessly!
……I'm grateful things got better so quickly.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I'm going to spriiiing up. So, your instructions, please!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: In this case, asking for guidance from Trainer would be a good and objective decision.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: After all, I'm the perfect class president, with a side of honesty!
choice_data_list: Then, let's train again! In short distances!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Indee――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wait, short distances!?
choice_data_list: Because what we need is more speed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I seeeee! That is very true!
choice_data_list: Then, let's run the Aoi Stakes next!

text_block_list.text: It's a lower grade, but it's a 1200 meter race that should be a steady winner.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Understood. I'll win by a huge margin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And restore the wounded pride of the class president!!
Thus, the next race was decided to be the Aoi Stakes!
